author: Francisco Rodrigues
title: Brazil’s Méliuz Buys $28.6M in Bitcoin, Becomes Top Public BTC Holder in Latin America
description: The company reported a BTC yield of 908%, ranking it among the largest among bitcoin treasury companies.
content:
Brazilian fintech firm Méliuz (CASH3), which serves over 30 million users in the country, has become Latin Americas largest publicly listed corporate holder of bitcoin 
.The company said Monday that… [+940 chars]
